          "name": "response",
          "secure": false,
          "value": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "As we continue working remotely, we at Absa have made it possible for you to "
                  },
                  {
                    "type": "link",
                    "url": "https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qrQGpj0jOzQpK8mezUpKdVOFmxQgAUVM/edit",
                    "children": [
                      {
                        "text": "Purchase furniture for your home office at preferential rates"
                      }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    "text": ".  "
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": " "
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "So, use this offer to set up your ideal home working environment."
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
